History: -year-old woman with cardiomyopathy and prior VR arrest. ICD implant.
Impression: PA and lateral chest compared to : Small left pleural effusion has decreased substantially since. Small right pleural effusion or more likely right pleural scarring, unchanged. No pneumothorax or mediastinal widening. Lungs are grossly clear.
